name: Burglar's Pack
text:
Includes:
• a backpack
• a Ball Bearings (Bag of 1,000)
• 10 feet of string
• a bell
• 5 candle
• a crowbar
• a hammer
• 10 piton
• a hooded lantern
• 2 Oil (flask)
• 5 days Rations (1 day)
• a tinderbox
• a waterskin
• Hempen Rope (50 feet)
Source: Player's Handbook p. 151
